Reviews.Title: “Watch your Credit Card Statement”
Reviews.Author: All Cut U
Reviews.Content: stay son surgery hospital morn bed terrible pillows uncomfortable plug phone charger seperate loose top quoted rate charged cc 9900 call adjusted 78 called didnt charge tax reservation total costs stay

Reviews.Title: “Bacon aroma is your wake-up call”
Reviews.Author: flyermontana
Reviews.Content: overnight stop near airport due convenience free shuttle comfortable beds couldn’t believe size bed quality sheets huge single carpets stained amenities free wifi toiletries towels nice water pressure shower excellent hotel surrounded hotels dining options walking walk 10 minutes gas store waffle house restaurant walking badly lighted road propositioned creepy car don’t recommend breakfast selection looked fruit hardboiled eggs yogurt cereal choices healthy options entire lobby smells strongly bacon wafted third floor guess wake wakeup call requested happen 530 am shuttle leave time aside missed wakeup call satisfied hotel definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great stay friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: 1greenriver
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel january 6 2011 7 airport flying pick ones wasnt becky front desk nice gentleman rodney shuttled airport super nice couldnt stay stay thanks stay charlene

Reviews.Title: “The Most Fantastic Hotel in INDY!!!”
Reviews.Author: Thedon95648
Reviews.Content: im national account executive travel lot stayed ramada 4 consecutive times travels staff wonderful continental breakfast stayed lot hotels food normally nasty clean hotel beds comfortable hotel stay travel indianapolis reccomend person reading review mike

Reviews.Title: “This is a clean, inviting, resonably priced hotel with a welcoming friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: sailinbob
Reviews.Content: stayed oct 10 november hotel ill call hotel didnt extend stay night moved location staff warm friendly clean appointed hotel buy own hair products soap am happy didnt stay night bed ramada provided perfect rest day stay

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service Stinks”
Reviews.Author: Frank-O-XO
Reviews.Content: 4 calls retrieve left received return call left detailed message head house keeping spoke management barbara detailed issue called week

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada Airport Indianapolis
